title: April Anarchy is today. Perfect time to reminisce. #shorts

transcript_chunks.text: [Applause] there's been a lot of good stuff going around about me losing my mind coming back from paternity leave and having all this pent up energy reminiscing about when i tombstone power drive to that kid at the city comic con that was me trying to make it up to him after he brought up a sign in the middle of the show that was like we love you and i grabbed it i was in the middle of some rant i screamed at him and threw it back in his face and as soon as it left my hand i saw him start to get like i grabbed him like no no sorry took it too far took it too far get up here for the joke your mind was like no don't worry i'll i'll do a wrestling move on them remember it wasn't straight tears to the tombstone piledriver you whispered in his ear like are you down to roughhouse or you said something along i don't remember that but i don't know actually this kid's ear in my eyes [Applause]
